ad_text: Veriha Trucking, Inc. Sponsored Put your safety first: be a Class A CDL truck driver with us 🚚 If you’re a Class A CDL truck driver looking for a company that has your safety mindset, Veriha Trucking might be your best fit! At Veriha, your safety is our #1 priority: ✅ We listen to your gut when it tells you it’s not safe to drive ✅ Cutting-edge technologies ✅ 100% no-touch freight ✅ Reliable tractors ✅ Guaranteed home time ✅ We put our team of drivers first and loads second PLUS get rewarded for your safe driving with our Quarterly Safety + Performance bonus Sound like the support system you want out on the road? Click on the “Learn More” button below to chat with us! 👇 FB.COM fb.com Learn more

Veriha Trucking, Inc. Sponsored Start a new career with a paid apprenticeship in truck driving! 🚚 Our program offers hands-on training and on-the-job experience with experienced trainers and instructors to help you succeed as a truck driver. Discover the benefits of a stable, in-demand profession with great earning potential. Take the first step towards a rewarding career on the road! Our trucks are loaded with the latest safety features and we constantly look for the next piece of technology to make your job easier and help keep you safe. Plus, we'll make sure you're fully trained on everything and that you stay up-to-date on all the latest driving practices from those with years of experience. Our training program to get your Class A CDL is paid, we offer a full benefits package, and offer weekly home time in almost all of our hiring areas! So, if you're looking for a company that values safety and innovation, come and join our team! Click on the “Learn More” button below to get started! 👇 FB.COM Become a Truck Driver! Happiness starts here. Learn more

Veriha Trucking, Inc. Sponsored Are you looking to become a truck driver? 🚚 Look no further! Veriha Trucking is a leading transportation company that is committed to keeping our drivers and the public safe on the road. Best part for you? We offer a Class A CDL Apprenticeship Program that earns you a paycheck from day one! 💸 As a member of our team, you will have access to the latest industry technologies, including steering assist and collision avoidance systems. Our trucks are equipped with state-of-the-art safety features and we provide ongoing training to ensure that our drivers are up-to-date on the latest and best practices for safe driving. In addition to top-of-the-line equipment and training, we also have a strict adherence to compliance and regulations. We believe that safety should never be compromised and we take great pride in our safety culture. Sound like the support you’ve been looking for to jump-start your career as a Class A CDL driver? Click on the “Learn More” button 👇 to chat with us now and get your name on the list for our next class! FB.COM Chat with us 👉 Happiness starts here. Learn More

Veriha Trucking, Inc. Sponsored We want to thank YOU for being a Truck Driver! 🚚 If you love trucking but not necessarily the company you currently drive for, please keep reading! Veriha Trucking has open spots for experienced drivers! ✅ Experienced PAY from $1,150 – $1950 / week depending on the position. ✅ Home weekly for a full 48 hours is available in almost all of our hiring areas! ✅ 100% NO TOUCH dry van freight! ✅ Guaranteed weekly pay starting at $900 (like a security blanket for weeks with unexpected challenges) Some other things about us: ✅ We recognize that YOU are the only one who can make the daily determination that it’s safe to drive (from weather storms to feeling under the weather, we honor your decision!) ✅ We put our drivers' safety over the loads (see above) ✅ No Forced Dispatch (again…see above) ✅ Top 20 Best Fleets to Drive For in 2022 (we like to think this ties into the above as well) Of course, we have more we could talk about, but we want to talk more about YOU. Click on the “Apply Now” button to chat! FB.COM Chat with us HERE 👉 Learn more

Veriha Trucking, Inc. Sponsored Would YOU like to be an Entertainment Truck Driver? No experience required – we have the training needed to make you a safe and successful driver! Benefits to include: 🎸Haul gear for the artist, such as the stage, sound equipment, lights, and so much more! 🚚 Travel the full 48 states + some tours may go into Canada 🛣 Be on road the entire length of the tour to get the full experience 👨👩Family atmosphere on the road & in the office 💸 Get paid weekly for each day you are on the road, regardless of miles or if you sit or drive that day! 💸 Pay starting at $180 a day regardless if you drive or not! Paycheck every week! 🚚 Fast-paced and long length of hauls when driving ✅FREE Access to Doctors (starting Day 1) via Teladoc ✅Consistent contract freight when not on tour Sound like something you can see yourself doing? Let us help get your career as an Entertainment Driver started! Click on the “Learn More” button below 👇 or TEXT TO APPLY by texting "verihajobs" to (717)670-6694!
